locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: "David Beckham's Soccer USA" is a television series which followed David Beckham's first season playing for Major League Soccer team Los Angeles Galaxy. The show traveled around the USA and Canada following the team's attempts to make the play-offs with their new star player. Each week David Beckham gave insight on playing with his new team in America and on the world of soccer. The show was made by Simon Fuller's 19 Entertainment (makers of 'American Idol') and broadcast on Fox Soccer Channel in the USA and in over 60 countries worldwide. It featured interviews, game highlights and exclusive behind-the-scenes action.
imdb.title: David Beckham's Soccer USA
